actions.name: Armor Tail
actions.description: The triggering Priority Action fails to hit you, and additional Priority Actions that hit you also fail to hit you and your allies within 8m of you until your next activation, or when the round ends, whichever is first. Priority Actions failing to hit you do not activate on-miss effects.

cost.trigger: You, or an allied creature within 8m of you, is hit by a [Priority] Action.
